attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Gordon
I am 62, I lost my business due to the economic disaster, none of my making, I need a job desperately, if you would like to look at my CV please advise email address to send it to!

Regards
B

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
